messages.message:
question on the "validation alerts" field filter in human review - is this supposed to retain whatever you last had it set to? it looks like if I leave it toggled on in an app run or deployment run, it's on by default the next time I run the app (on new/different files).

if this is expected, is it specific to the individual user? or could one user apply the filter on the files they're reviewing, and another user would have the filter applied when they enter human review?
Do you know the answer to this? @andy @Paul H
